basics.name: Daniele Faieta
basics.label: Software Professional
basics.summary: I've been working professionally in software development for about 20 years, but it has been a lifelong passion. I don't consider myself just a programmer, as I have transitioned from a passion for cybersecurity during my school days to a strong interest in the devops culture and the infrastructural/architectural side of systems. I'm rigorous and attentive to the technical aspects, but I have the necessary sensitivity and experience to understand what is important to develop for the company I work for. I'm driven by curiosity, which makes me a person with interests in all areas, something I consider fundamental to being a better professional.

work.name: ThinkIN
work.summary: Reporting directly to the CTO, main focuses of my job are:
highlights: Develop new IoT devices integrations such as sensors and digital displays from the edge components to the cloud APIs
Maintain the IoT cloud platform, based on Scala + AKKA Streams
Express a technical and architectural vision about new product feature for our IoT cloud platform and discuss them with sales, marketing and product people
Oversight architectural and development choices about custom vertical solutions based on our cloud platform, tailored for various customer needs
Mentor interns and junior developers supervising research projects as well as brand new modules built on top of our cloud platform
Cooperate actively with infrastructure/operations people for support activities

work.name: expert.ai
work.summary: Working as R&D software engineer for Platform engineering cross-functional team.
highlights: Develop scalable and HA services and modules in a large microservices architecture on top of kubernetes clusters, with asynchronous data flows using message brokers as well as classic REST APIs communications for a MLOps platform solution
Hold code reviews, pair programming sessions and mentoring with junior developers
Interface with SRE teams to provide feedback for IaC custom tools as well as SDLC pipeline improvements
Work closely with PO and SM to deliver value meeting quarter releases deadlines
Study and explore new tools, solutions, approaches to solve technical challenges
Troubleshooting and support management among tickets for the NLAPI product and Developer portal - meeting SLA requirements

work.name: Almaviva S.p.A.
highlights: SRT: technical leader responsible for integration/porting of legacy modules and golive of the new application; support and incident management, code reviews and delivery of new releases

A4G: technical reference for the client, leading a team of three. Responsible for new REST/SOAP services development and integration with already existing ones, working remotely with two other teams using LeSS (large scale scrum) agile framework

work.name: TC Consulting S.r.l.
work.summary: Client projects for GPI S.p.A. and Fercam S.p.A.
highlights: Analysis and startup activities management for a module responsible of managing orders and commissions developed in a proprietary environment based on 4GL, leading a team of three
Technical reference for the client; analysis and development of features and modules for data interchange between systems

work.name: Geopartner S.r.l.
work.summary: Analysis and development of GeoKAT desktop client, a GIS cadastre management client.

work.name: Wolters Kluwer Italia
highlights: Genya: analysis and development of framework modules and new functionalities to implement payroll integration
Giotto: analysis and development of new functionalities of a legacy payroll software
GiottoBudget: analysis and development of a new HR budget application based on existing payroll algorithms and structures

work.name: I&T Servizi
work.summary: Client: Informatica Trentina - Public administration software development.
highlights: MLC (monitoring of legislative and conferences activity): new features development, reporting
SGA (students and schools management system): primarily backend WCF services development plus some windows forms development
FGT (youth fund management): fullstack development
IOP (employees' portal): development of a module for Oracle WCI portlet container

SBC (cultural heritage management system): development of a mass import module using advanced WCF features, maintenance of existing features, GIS module implementation, integration with other systems using Biztalk

work.name: Digitalsoft
work.summary: Industrial automation and enterprise software development.
highlights: Honeywell Turbo Technologies: Analysis and development of MHS (Material handling system) including core functionalities for managing three-way forklifts operatorless, TAPI module for automatic maintenance call system, SAP integration, visual dashboards for realtime production data
Tod's: Analysis, development, delivery and golive of 'Scanshops', a set of tools for logistics and warehouse flow handling used by retail shop managers relying on Windows CE barcode scanners
DelVerde Industrie Alimentari: Analysis, development, delivery and golive of the enterprise warehouse and logistics system
Giobby: Analysis and development, MySQL and Apache Tomcat cluster configuration with load balancing and HA capabilities
